title: Going into game Champion's Spawn the Game Freeze's my computer entirely
body: No matter what how i work it when i get into the game it freeze's my entire computer and then i have to turn it off and on again and i tried using the fixing tool that comes with the client but it didn't fix the issue

replies.body:
PC freezes really suck because they usually leave you *really* behind, so I can imagine how frustrating this must be for you. If you're running Windows 10, this is most likely tied to the *Game DVR* feature Microsoft has baked into the Windows Game Bar. I'd like you to temporarily disable this feature by following the steps inside [this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if anything changes.

Let me know if this was able to resolve your issue. ^.^
